message: I can’t log into my account—keeps saying invalid credentials.
summary: Customer unable to log into account due to invalid credentials.

message: Le site est très lent lorsque je charge la page d’accueil.
summary: The site is very slow when loading the homepage.

message: I love the new dashboard but wish there were more filter options.
summary: Positive feedback with a suggestion for improvement

message: No recibo notificaciones por correo después de actualizar mi plan.
summary: Customer is not receiving email notifications after updating their plan.
themes: Email notifications not working, Plan update issue

message: The pricing page is confusing—hard to tell what’s included.
summary: Customers are finding the pricing page confusing due to lack of clarity on what's included.
themes: Confusing pricing page, Lack of clarity on included items

message: J’ai besoin d’aide pour réinitialiser mon mot de passe.
summary: Customer needs assistance with resetting their password.

message: La aplicación se bloquea a menudo en mi teléfono.
summary: Frequent app crashes on my phone.

message: Can you add a dark mode option? It’s hard on the eyes at night.
summary: Request for dark mode option due to eye strain at night.

message: Le support technique est très réactif, merci !
summary: Very responsive technical support, thanks!

message: Me gustaría ver más tutoriales en video sobre el uso de la plataforma.
summary: Request for more video tutorials on platform usage

message: I need to change my billing information but can’t find where to do it.
summary: Customer having difficulty changing billing information
themes: billing information update, technical support needed

message: L’interface utilisateur est très intuitive et facile à naviguer.
summary: Positive feedback on user interface

message: No puedo encontrar la opción para cancelar mi suscripción.
summary: Customer is having trouble finding the option to cancel subscription.

message: The app crashes when I try to upload a file larger than 10MB.
summary: App crashes when uploading large files

message: J’aimerais avoir plus d’options de personnalisation dans l’application.
summary: Customer requests more customization options in the application.

message: El proceso de registro es demasiado largo y complicado.
summary: The registration process is too long and complicated.
themes: Registration process length, Registration process complexity

message: I received a charge I didn’t authorize—please investigate.
summary: Unauthorized charge reported for investigation.

message: Le service client est très utile et répond rapidement.
summary: Excellent customer service with quick responses.

message: No entiendo cómo funciona el sistema de puntos de recompensa.
summary: Customer is confused about the reward points system.

message: Can you provide more details on the new features in the latest update?
summary: Customer is inquiring about more details on new features in the latest update.

message: J’ai des problèmes de connexion avec l’application mobile.
summary: Connection issues with mobile application

message: La calidad del audio en las llamadas es muy baja.
summary: Low audio quality in calls

message: I want to know how to export my data from the platform.
summary: Customer is seeking guidance on exporting data from the platform.

message: Le site web est souvent en panne, c’est très frustrant.
summary: Frequent website outages causing frustration

message: No puedo acceder a mi cuenta desde la aplicación móvil.

message: The new feature is great, but it’s a bit slow to load.
summary: Customers like the new feature but note it is slow to load.

message: J’aimerais avoir plus de choix de langues dans l’application.

message: El soporte técnico no responde a mis correos electrónicos.

message: I need help with my account settings but can’t find the right section.

message: L’application est très utile pour mon travail quotidien.

message: No puedo actualizar mi información de pago en la cuenta.

message: The notifications are too frequent—can I adjust the settings?

message: La aplicación se cierra inesperadamente al abrirla.

message: I want to know if there’s a way to recover deleted files.

message: The customer support is very helpful and responsive.

message: El sitio web es muy lento y a veces no carga.
